TWinSparkle.SetLang(string) Method

Summary

Sets the language of the UI.

Namespace: WinSparkle
Syntax
Delphi
public
 procedure SetLang(const newLang: string);

Parameters

newLang
Type: string

Remarks

  • If you want to change the language at runtime, you need to call Init and reapply any settings of the event (callback functions)
